snippet: The circle of those who saw video of a coach’s abusive acts as soon as December was wider than had been understood.
abstract: Rutgers president Robert L Barchi and athletic director Tim Pernetti present conflicting depictions of who was responsible for decision to keep basketball coach Mike Rice on staff after administrators learned of abusive behavior; Pernetti resigns, implying that university was making him scapegoat in scandal.

byline.original: By KATE ZERNIKE and STEVE EDER
byline.contributor: Matt Flegenheimer, Randy Leonard and Nate Schweber contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The circle of those who saw video of a coach’s abusive acts as soon as December was wider than had been understood.

headline.seo: Tim Pernetti, Rutgers Athletic Director, Resigns
headline.main: Rutgers Tries to Calm Furor as More Officials Quit
headline.print_headline: Athletic Director Quits at Rutgers As Fallout Grows

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
